rules_text:
Flying, trample
When this creature transforms into Ena, Red Dragon, put three time counters on it.
[i]Laguz Gauge[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from Ena, then if she has no time counters on her, transform her.
[i]Blood Tide[/i] – Other creatures you control get +2/+2 and “[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.”
